verses.verse: אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which הָיָ֤ה <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> The word יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD אֶֽל־ <WH413> to יִרְמְיָ֔הוּ <WH3414> that came to Jeremiah עַל־ <WH5921> in דִּבְרֵ֖י <WH1697> concerning הַבַּצָּרֽוֹת׃ <WH1226> the dearth

אָבְלָ֣ה <WH56> mourneth יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> Judah וּשְׁעָרֶ֥יהָ <WH8179> and the gates אֻמְלְל֖וּ <WH535> thereof languish קָדְר֣וּ <WH6937> they are black לָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> unto the ground וְצִוְחַ֥ת <WH6682> and the cry יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem עָלָֽתָה׃ <WH5927> is gone up

וְאַדִּ֣רֵיהֶ֔ם <WH117> And their nobles שָׁלְח֥וּ <WH7971> have sent [צְעֹורֵיהֶם כ] (צְעִירֵיהֶ֖ם <WH6810> least ק) לַמָּ֑יִם <WH4325> to the waters בָּ֣אוּ <WH935> they came עַל־ <WH5921> unto גֵּבִ֞ים <WH1356> the cisterns לֹא־ <WH3808> no מָ֣צְאוּ <WH4672> [and] found מַ֗יִם <WH4325> no water שָׁ֤בוּ <WH7725> they returned כְלֵיהֶם֙ <WH3627> with their vessels רֵיקָ֔ם <WH7387> empty בֹּ֥שׁוּ <WH954> they were ashamed וְהָכְלְמ֖וּ <WH3637> and confounded וְחָפ֥וּ <WH2645> and covered רֹאשָֽׁם׃ <WH7218> their heads

בַּעֲב֤וּר <WH5668> Because הָאֲדָמָה֙ <WH127> Because the ground חַ֔תָּה <WH2865> is chapt כִּ֛י <WH3588> for לֹא־ <WH3808> no הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> has been גֶ֖שֶׁם <WH1653> for there was no rain בָּאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> in the earth בֹּ֥שׁוּ <WH954> were ashamed אִכָּרִ֖ים <WH406> the plowmen חָפ֥וּ <WH2645> they covered רֹאשָֽׁם׃ <WH7218> their heads

כִּ֤י <WH3588> Because גַם־ <WH1571> even אַיֶּ֙לֶת֙ <WH365> Yea the hind בַּשָּׂדֶ֔ה <WH7704> in the field יָלְדָ֖ה <WH3205> also calved וְעָז֑וֹב <WH5800> and forsook כִּ֥י <WH3588> Because לֹֽא־ <WH3808> is no הָיָ֖ה <WH1961> become דֶּֽשֶׁא׃ <WH1877> [it] because there was no grass

וּפְרָאִים֙ <WH6501> And the wild asses עָמְד֣וּ <WH5975> did stand עַל־ <WH5921> on שְׁפָיִ֔ם <WH8205> in the high places שָׁאֲפ֥וּ <WH7602> they snuffed up ר֖וּחַ <WH7307> the wind כַּתַּנִּ֑ים <WH8577> like dragons כָּל֥וּ <WH3615> did fail עֵינֵיהֶ֖ם <WH5869> their eyes כִּי־ <WH3588> For אֵ֥ין <WH369> there עֵֽשֶׂב׃ <WH6212> because [there was] no grass

אִם־ <WH518> Although עֲוֹנֵ֙ינוּ֙ <WH5771> though our iniquities עָ֣נוּ <WH6030> testify בָ֔נוּ יְהוָ֕ה <WH3068> O LORD עֲשֵׂ֖ה <WH6213> against us do לְמַ֣עַן <WH4616> sake שְׁמֶ֑ךָ <WH8034> thou [it] for thy name's כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Truly רַבּ֥וּ <WH7231> are many מְשׁוּבֹתֵ֖ינוּ <WH4878> sake for our backslidings לְךָ֥ חָטָֽאנוּ׃ <WH2398> we have sinned

מִקְוֵה֙ <WH4723> O the hope יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel מֽוֹשִׁיע֖וֹ <WH3467> the saviour בְּעֵ֣ת <WH6256> thereof in time צָרָ֑ה <WH6869> of trouble לָ֤מָּה <WH4100> Why תִֽהְיֶה֙ <WH1961> like כְּגֵ֣ר <WH1616> why shouldest thou be as a stranger בָּאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> in the land וּכְאֹרֵ֖חַ <WH732> and as a wayfaring man נָטָ֥ה <WH5186> [that] turneth aside לָלֽוּן׃ <WH3885> to tarry for a night

לָ֤מָּה <WH4100> Why תִֽהְיֶה֙ <WH1961> like כְּאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> Why shouldest thou be as a man נִדְהָ֔ם <WH1724> astonied כְּגִבּ֖וֹר <WH1368> as a mighty man לֹא־ <WH3808> not יוּכַ֣ל <WH3201> [that] cannot לְהוֹשִׁ֑יעַ <WH3467> save וְאַתָּ֧ה <WH859> in בְקִרְבֵּ֣נוּ <WH7130> [art] in the midst יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> ? yet thou O LORD וְשִׁמְךָ֛ <WH8034> by thy name עָלֵ֥ינוּ <WH5921> and we נִקְרָ֖א <WH7121> of us and we are called אַל־ <WH408> nay תַּנִּחֵֽנוּ׃ <WH3240> leave ס

כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֨ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> the LORD לָעָ֣ם <WH5971> unto this people הַזֶּ֗ה <WH2088> to this כֵּ֤ן <WH3651> so אָֽהֲבוּ֙ <WH157> Thus have they loved לָנ֔וּעַ <WH5128> to wander רַגְלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH7272> their feet לֹ֣א <WH3808> have not חָשָׂ֑כוּ <WH2820> they have not refrained וַיהוָה֙ <WH3068> therefore the LORD לֹ֣א <WH3808> does not רָצָ֔ם <WH7521> doth not accept עַתָּה֙ <WH6258> now יִזְכֹּ֣ר <WH2142> them he will now remember עֲוֹנָ֔ם <WH5771> their iniquity וְיִפְקֹ֖ד <WH6485> and visit חַטֹּאתָֽם׃ <WH2403> their sins ס

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> Then said יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD אֵלָ֑י <WH413> about אַל־ <WH408> not תִּתְפַּלֵּ֛ל <WH6419> unto me Pray בְּעַד־ <WH1157> about הָעָ֥ם <WH5971> not for this people הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> of this לְטוֹבָֽה׃ <WH2896> for [their] good

כִּ֣י <WH3588> When יָצֻ֗מוּ <WH6684> When they fast אֵינֶ֤נִּי <WH369> I am not שֹׁמֵ֙עַ֙ <WH8085> I will not hear אֶל־ <WH413> to רִנָּתָ֔ם <WH7440> their cry וְכִ֧י <WH3588> and when יַעֲל֛וּ <WH5927> and when they offer עֹלָ֥ה <WH5930> burnt offering וּמִנְחָ֖ה <WH4503> and an oblation אֵינֶ֣נִּי <WH369> I am not רֹצָ֑ם <WH7521> I will not accept כִּ֗י <WH3588> Rather בַּחֶ֙רֶב֙ <WH2719> them by the sword וּבָרָעָ֣ב <WH7458> and by the famine וּבַדֶּ֔בֶר <WH1698> and by the pestilence אָנֹכִ֖י <WH595> I מְכַלֶּ֥ה <WH3615> them but I will consume אוֹתָֽם׃ <WH853> ס

וָאֹמַ֞ר <WH559> Then said אֲהָ֣הּ ׀ <WH162> I Ah אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> Lord יְהוִ֗ה <WH3069> GOD הִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> Look הַנְּבִאִ֜ים <WH5030> behold the prophets אֹמְרִ֤ים <WH559> say לָהֶם֙ לֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor תִרְא֣וּ <WH7200> unto them Ye shall not see חֶ֔רֶב <WH2719> the sword וְרָעָ֖ב <WH7458> neither shall ye have famine לֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor יִהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> have לָכֶ֑ם כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for שְׁל֤וֹם <WH7965> peace אֱמֶת֙ <WH571> you assured אֶתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> but I will give לָכֶ֔ם בַּמָּק֖וֹם <WH4725> in this place הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this ס

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> Then the LORD אֵלַ֗י <WH413> about שֶׁ֚קֶר <WH8267> lies הַנְּבִאִים֙ <WH5030> unto me The prophets נִבְּאִ֣ים <WH5012> prophesy בִּשְׁמִ֔י <WH8034> in my name לֹ֤א <WH3808> have neither שְׁלַחְתִּים֙ <WH7971> I sent וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> nor צִוִּיתִ֔ים <WH6680> them not neither have I commanded וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> nor דִבַּ֖רְתִּי <WH1696> them neither spake אֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <WH413> about חֲז֨וֹן <WH2377> vision שֶׁ֜קֶר <WH8267> unto you a false וְקֶ֤סֶם <WH7081> and divination [וֶאֱלוּל כ] (וֶֽאֱלִיל֙ <WH457> idol ק) [וְתַרְמוּת כ] (וְתַרְמִ֣ית <WH8649> deceit ק) לִבָּ֔ם <WH3820> of their heart הֵ֖מָּה <WH1992> they מִֽתְנַבְּאִ֥ים <WH5012> unto them they prophesy לָכֶֽם׃ ס

לָכֵ֞ן <WH3651> Therefore כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Therefore thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD עַֽל־ <WH5921> concerning הַנְּבִאִ֞ים <WH5030> concerning the prophets הַנִּבְּאִ֣ים <WH5012> that prophesy בִּשְׁמִי֮ <WH8034> in my name וַאֲנִ֣י <WH589> There לֹֽא־ <WH3808> will be no שְׁלַחְתִּים֒ <WH7971> and I sent וְהֵ֙מָּה֙ <WH1992> those אֹֽמְרִ֔ים <WH559> them not yet they say חֶ֣רֶב <WH2719> Sword וְרָעָ֔ב <WH7458> and famine לֹ֥א <WH3808> will be no יִהְיֶ֖ה <WH1961> become בָּאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> shall not be in this land הַזֹּ֑את <WH2063> likewise בַּחֶ֤רֶב <WH2719> By sword וּבָֽרָעָב֙ <WH7458> and famine יִתַּ֔מּוּ <WH8552> be consumed הַנְּבִאִ֖ים <WH5030> shall those prophets הָהֵֽמָּה׃ <WH1992> those

וְהָעָ֣ם <WH5971> And the people אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> to whom הֵ֣מָּה <WH1992> them נִבְּאִ֣ים <WH5012> to whom they prophesy לָהֶ֡ם <WH1992> like יִֽהְי֣וּ <WH1961> become מֻשְׁלָכִים֩ <WH7993> shall be cast out בְּחֻצ֨וֹת <WH2351> in the streets יְרוּשָׁלִַ֜ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem מִפְּנֵ֣י ׀ <WH6440> because הָרָעָ֣ב <WH7458> of the famine וְהַחֶ֗רֶב <WH2719> and the sword וְאֵ֤ין <WH369> and there מְקַבֵּר֙ <WH6912> and they shall have none to bury לָהֵ֔מָּה <WH1992> like הֵ֣מָּה <WH1992> like נְשֵׁיהֶ֔ם <WH802> them their wives וּבְנֵיהֶ֖ם <WH1121> nor their sons וּבְנֹֽתֵיהֶ֑ם <WH1323> nor their daughters וְשָׁפַכְתִּ֥י <WH8210> for I will pour עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH5921> and אֶת־ <WH853> רָעָתָֽם׃ <WH7451> their wickedness

וְאָמַרְתָּ֤ <WH559> Therefore thou shalt say אֲלֵיהֶם֙ <WH413> about אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּבָ֣ר <WH1697> this word הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> this תֵּרַ֨דְנָה <WH3381> run down עֵינַ֥י <WH5869> unto them Let mine eyes דִּמְעָ֛ה <WH1832> with tears לַ֥יְלָה <WH3915> night וְיוֹמָ֖ם <WH3119> and day וְאַל־ <WH408> not תִּדְמֶ֑ינָה <WH1820> and let them not cease כִּי֩ <WH3588> for שֶׁ֨בֶר <WH7665> is broken גָּד֜וֹל <WH1419> with a great נִשְׁבְּרָ֗ה <WH7667> breach בְּתוּלַת֙ <WH1330> for the virgin בַּת־ <WH1323> daughter עַמִּ֔י <WH5971> of my people מַכָּ֖ה <WH4347> blow נַחְלָ֥ה <WH2470> grievous מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> with a very

אִם־ <WH518> If יָצָ֣אתִי <WH3318> If I go forth הַשָּׂדֶ֗ה <WH7704> into the field וְהִנֵּה֙ <WH2009> Behold חַלְלֵי־ <WH2491> then behold the slain חֶ֔רֶב <WH2719> with the sword וְאִם֙ <WH518> if בָּ֣אתִי <WH935> and if I enter הָעִ֔יר <WH5892> into the city וְהִנֵּ֖ה <WH2009> Behold תַּחֲלוּאֵ֣י <WH8463> then behold them that are sick רָעָ֑ב <WH7458> with famine כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For גַם־ <WH1571> both נָבִ֧יא <WH5030> yea both the prophet גַם־ <WH1571> both כֹּהֵ֛ן <WH3548> and the priest סָחֲר֥וּ <WH5503> go about אֶל־ <WH413> in אֶ֖רֶץ <WH776> into a land וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> not יָדָֽעוּ׃ <WH3045> that they know ס

הֲמָאֹ֨ס <WH3988> Hast thou utterly מָאַ֜סְתָּ <WH3988> rejected אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> Judah אִם־ <WH518> lo בְּצִיּוֹן֙ <WH6726> Zion גָּעֲלָ֣ה <WH1602> lothed נַפְשֶׁ֔ךָ <WH5315> any מַדּ֙וּעַ֙ <WH4069> have You הִכִּיתָ֔נוּ <WH5221> stricken וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> are beyond לָ֖נוּ מַרְפֵּ֑א <WH4832> us and [there is] no healing קַוֵּ֤ה <WH6960> for us? we looked לְשָׁלוֹם֙ <WH7965> for peace וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> nothing ט֔וֹב <WH2896> and [there is] no good וּלְעֵ֥ת <WH6256> and for the time מַרְפֵּ֖א <WH4832> of healing וְהִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> behold בְעָתָֽה׃ <WH1205> and behold trouble

יָדַ֧עְנוּ <WH3045> We acknowledge יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> O LORD רִשְׁעֵ֖נוּ <WH7562> our wickedness עֲוֹ֣ן <WH5771> [and] the iniquity אֲבוֹתֵ֑ינוּ <WH1> of our fathers כִּ֥י <WH3588> for חָטָ֖אנוּ <WH2398> for we have sinned לָֽךְ׃

אַל־ <WH408> not תִּנְאַץ֙ <WH5006> Do not abhor לְמַ֣עַן <WH4616> sake שִׁמְךָ֔ <WH8034> [us] for thy name's אַל־ <WH408> not תְּנַבֵּ֖ל <WH5034> sake do not disgrace כִּסֵּ֣א <WH3678> the throne כְבוֹדֶ֑ךָ <WH3519> of thy glory זְכֹ֕ר <WH2142> remember אַל־ <WH408> not תָּפֵ֥ר <WH6565> break בְּרִֽיתְךָ֖ <WH1285> not thy covenant אִתָּֽנוּ׃ <WH854> for

הֲיֵ֨שׁ <WH3426> Are there בְּהַבְלֵ֤י <WH1892> [any] among the vanities הַגּוֹיִם֙ <WH1471> of the Gentiles מַגְשִׁמִ֔ים <WH1652> that can cause rain וְאִם־ <WH518> can הַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <WH8064> ? or can the heavens יִתְּנ֣וּ <WH5414> give רְבִבִ֑ים <WH7241> shower הֲלֹ֨א <WH3808> not אַתָּה־ <WH859> you ה֜וּא <WH1931> he יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> Jehovah אֱלֹהֵ֙ינוּ֙ <WH430> angels וּ֨נְקַוֶּה־ <WH6960> gather לָּ֔ךְ כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אַתָּ֥ה <WH859> who עָשִׂ֖יתָ <WH6213> upon thee for thou hast made אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֵֽלֶּה׃ <WH428> these פ
